name: Envy Custom Post Widget WordPress Plugin
author: EnvyTheme

sections.description:
Envy Custom Post Widget WordPress Plugin is for creating multiple blog/posts with different styles. It is coming with easy to use features such as custom posts management, recent post widgets, popular posts widget, etc. 

Custom Post Management

Recent Posts Widget

Popular Posts Widget

Related Posts Widget

   * Widget Title Option
   * Filter Posts By Category
   * Filter Posts By Tag
   * Posts Count (max. 50)
   * Skip Posts (max. 50)
   * Show/Hide Posts Content
   * Number Of Words
   * Show/Hide Posts Author
   * Show/Hide Posts Date
   * Posts Date Format
   * Show Comments Number
   * Ignore Sticky Posts
   * Show Featured Image
   * Image Height
   * Image Width
   * Custom Image Option
   * Show/Hide Custom Image
   * Custom CSS Option
   * Custom JS Option

Documentation and Support

 
– For documentation and tutorials go to our Documentation
– If you have any more questions, visit our support on the Plugin’s Forum
sections.installation:
From the dashboard:

  1. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section
  2. Search For “EnvyCustomPost”
  3. Install, then Activate it

From the control panel:

  1. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload envy-custom-post folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
